# Music Note Flashcard Trainer

A Vue 3 + Vite web application for interactive music note recognition training using real-time pitch detection.

## Project Structure
- Vue 3 with Composition API
- Pitchy.js for pitch detection using McLeod Pitch Method  
- Bravura font for musical notation
- Web Audio API for microphone input
- Responsive design with glassmorphism UI

## Development
- Dev server: `npm run dev` (http://localhost:5173/)
- Build: `npm run build`
- Preview: `npm run preview`

## Features
- Dual display modes (symbols/letters)
- Real-time pitch detection
- Score tracking
- Mobile responsive
- Professional music notation
